topWikis2.1:
EQ2i is an award winning wiki hosted at Wikia about the MMORPG EverQuest 2 by Sony Online Entertainment.
Featuring pages on a wide variety of Quests, Equipment, Items, Monsters, NPC, and Zones.
Registration is free, and we encourage everyone to help add what they know.

Featuring pages on a wide variety of Quests, Equipment, Items, Monsters, NPC, and Zones.
Registration is free, and we encourage everyone to help add what they know.

topBlogs.title: William91/Awakening_Companion_revealed:_Mhairi
topBlogs.description: The new companion will be a female human warrior called Mhairi. When she heard that two Grey Wardens defeated the Blight she vowed to serve the Wardens...
topBlogs.author: William91
